About Me

Allow me to explain

BIO

I'm a 2nd-year Computer Science bachelor, who is currently exploring roles that will guide me to become ardently versatile in the realm of software development. My areas of interest are Fintech, AI, ML, Blockchain, & Backend development. Mid-way through my Electrical Engineering degree I realised I had no passion for electrical engineering and made a decision to switch to something I'm more passionate about. Most would say why did it take me 3 years to realise this? Conversely, it was a struggle to give up because I wanted to put in my best efforts. I would like to gain more experience and knowledge with the same grit but with a passion upon given opportunities and possibilities.

11Point2

Engineering Intern

Through my experience with 11point2, I developed a deep understanding of Hydrogen, Ammonia, Wind & Solar energy, Carbon capture and emissions. Understood about the engineering, manufacturing, economics (including financial), and the trades related to it. This opportunity helped me in developing a newfound interest.

Advisors Alliance

Finance Intern

Learnt about the insurance industry, specifically on health and finances. I learnt how to create insurance plans and pitched a successful sale. Although not my domain, but I was curious about this industry and wanted to venture into it deeper.
